title: Trust-Based Entrustable Professional Activity (EPA) Learning Program for Nursing Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and understanding of human anatomy
context.additional_context: Aims to strengthen practical competencies in everyday nursing scenarios (blood pressure measurement, wound care, etc.). Learners are expected to participate in community health volunteer activities after completing the training

learning_goals: Learners understand the EPA framework and can perform at least three core nursing activities (e.g., infection control, patient mobility assistance)
Learners perform EPA-based patient assessment procedures with 80% accuracy using simulation tools within the LMS
Learners self-diagnose their EPA performance levels and develop improvement plans based on peer assessment feedback
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
